data.name: Connecting Crypto and Blockchain to Young Minds of India
data.summary:
The Webinar is envisioned to help students/Interns/Job Seekers/crypto aspirants to learn new skills, enhance their competence and find the right career opportunity in the crypto and blockchain ecosystem. This webinar will outline;

Career Opportunities in Cryptocurrency Spectrum
Basics of Blockchain Technology and Career in Blockchain Spectrum
How to land on best-suited Crypto and Blockchain-centric jobs?
data.speakers: Yukti Arora, Kumar Gaurav, Abhishek Shrisvastav
